query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS device_fingerprints (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  deviceHash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  deviceName VARCHAR(255),
  browserType VARCHAR(100),
  osType VARCHAR(100),
  ipAddress VARCHAR(45),
  userAgent TEXT,
  isVerified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  lastSeenAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmId) REFERENCES farms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_userId_farmId (userId, farmId),
  INDEX idx_deviceHash (deviceHash)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS device_fingerprints (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  deviceHash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  deviceName VARCHAR(255),
  browserType VARCHAR(100),
  osType VARCHAR(100),
  ipAddress VARCHAR(45),
  userAgent TEXT,
  isVerified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  lastSeenAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmId) REFERENCES farms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_userId_farmId (userId, farmId),
  INDEX idx_deviceHash (deviceHash)
);
